author: Shane Brinkman-Davis Delamore
description: Art.PromptFor - Wrapper for InquirerJs to make it even easier to write powerful CLI apps
name: @art-suite/art-prompt-for

scripts.build:
rsync -av --include='*.js' --include='*.css' --exclude='*' ./source/ ./build/
caf -m -c source -o build
npm run nn
scripts.build-clean:
# BUILD CLEAN START
#   - building into: build-temp
#
rm -rf ./__build-old__
rsync -av --include='*.js' --include='*.css' --exclude='*' ./source/ ./build/
caf -m -c source -o build-temp
npm run nn

nn build-temp/*

# BUILD CLEAN FINIALIZING
#  - replace old build in:   build
#  - with new build from:    build-temp
#
mv build __build-old__
mv build-temp build
rm -rf ./__build-old__
